originalText.text: I am thrilled with the results of my procedure performed by Dr Kolker.  His expertise and attention to detail along with his caring approach made the entire process so smooth.  The staff exceeded my expectations with their professionalism and friendliness.  They were efficient and dedicated to making me feel comfortable.  I couldn't be happier with my surgery and I highly recommend him for anyone who is considering undergoing cosmetic surgery.

text.text: I am thrilled with the results of my procedure performed by Dr Kolker.  His expertise and attention to detail along with his caring approach made the entire process so smooth.  The staff exceeded my expectations with their professionalism and friendliness.  They were efficient and dedicated to making me feel comfortable.  I couldn't be happier with my surgery and I highly recommend him for anyone who is considering undergoing cosmetic surgery.

originalText.text: Dr Kolker and his team are truly amazing!!! I have had two surgeries with him and the results were beyond my expectations. He listened to my needs and developed a plan that was safe and that gave me the exact result I was looking for. He had a hard task at hand with me because I had the same two procedures done before by another surgeon that didn’t go so well. Dr. Kolker is patient, kind, and cares about his work and his patients. He is also reasonable with his pricing.  I would highly recommend him and his team!!!

text.text: Dr Kolker and his team are truly amazing!!! I have had two surgeries with him and the results were beyond my expectations. He listened to my needs and developed a plan that was safe and that gave me the exact result I was looking for. He had a hard task at hand with me because I had the same two procedures done before by another surgeon that didn’t go so well. Dr. Kolker is patient, kind, and cares about his work and his patients. He is also reasonable with his pricing.  I would highly recommend him and his team!!!

originalText.text:
Dr. Kolker is truly in a class of his own. As a perfectionist myself, I don't say any of this lightly. His skill, talent, artistry, and expertise are incomparable. He is meticulous in his approach by going above and beyond to ensure the entire process is smooth and seamless.

After our son lost a significant amount of weight, we consulted with several surgeons for an abdominoplasty but never felt 100% comfortable. Once we met with Dr. Kolker, our search was finally over. It was crystal clear that not only is he a brilliantly gifted surgeon but also a genuinely kind, caring, and thoughtful man. Our minds were put at ease immediately, and we knew he was THE ONLY ONE we would entrust with our son's surgery. I can honestly say that Dr. Kolker treated our son as if he were his own child.

We couldn't be happier with the beautiful result and the special care we always felt from everyone on his office staff. There was never any doubt that we made the smartest decision to put our complete trust in Dr. Kolker. We are so grateful we were in his hands. You can rest assured he will take amazing care of you by dotting every i and crossing every t. Dr. Kolker will exceed even your highest expectations. He is a gem.

originalText.text: Dr. Kolker and his committed staff are no ordinary group. Working as a nurse myself, I’ve come to realize excellence, professionalism, outstanding bedside manner and patience are hard to come by in a physician but Dr. Kolker is a rare jewel. I did a lot of research and asked many questions and he thoughtfully addressed all of them. His front staff, nurses and anesthesia team were just as patient and willing to put in the extra effort to make me feel comfortable, especially with a life changing procedure. Go here, you’ll have no regrets.

originalText.text: I couldn’t believe how easy a process getting surgery with Dr. Kolker was. I was very nervous to have surgery initially, but Dr. Kolker and his team of nurses made me feel so comfortable and it couldn’t have been a more seamless process. And the results are amazing!! Better than I could have even imagined. Thank you Dr Kolker!!
